description: Loki - PrivateBin NGINX JSON Access Log

panels.description: PrivateBin POST request may contain both a created paste and post requests for discussion comments. Since the URL remains the same, it's not possible to determine whether it's a paste or a discussion comment. If you intend to use this dashboard, it is recommended to disable discussions, as this can lead to incorrect results.

targets.expr: count(count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | request_method="POST" | status=~"200|201|202|204" | accept=~".*application/json.*" | __error__=""[$__range]))

panels.title: Total Created Paste - Unique IP

panels.description: PrivateBin POST request may contain both a created paste and post requests for discussion comments. Since the URL remains the same, it's not possible to determine whether it's a paste or a discussion comment. If you intend to use this dashboard, it is recommended to disable discussions, as this can lead to incorrect results.

targets.expr: sum by(host) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | request_method="POST" | status=~"200|201|202|204" | accept=~".*application/json.*" | __error__="" [$__range]))

panels.title: Total Created Paste

panels.description: This can include both expired and unexpired paste requests.

targets.expr: sum by (host) (sum_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | request_method=~"GET|POST" | accept=~".*application/json.*" | unwrap body_bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__range]))

panels.title: Paste - Total Body Bytes Send

panels.description: This counter includes all 5xx requests for all types of requests, not just paste requests.

targets.expr: sum by(host) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | status=~"5.+" | __error__="" [$__range]))

panels.title: Total Request 5xx

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | __error__="" [$__range]))
count(count_over_time({job="nginx"} | json | remote_addr!="" | remote_addr!~"^172\\.20\\..*" | __error__="" [$__range])) by (remote_addr)

panels.description: This can include both expired and unexpired paste requests.

targets.expr: sum by(host) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | request_uri=~".*pasteid=.*" | request_method="GET" | accept=~".*application/json.*" | __error__="" [$__range]))

panels.title: Total Requested Paste

panels.description: This can include both expired and unexpired paste requests.

targets.expr: count(count by(cf_connecting_ip) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | request_uri=~".*pasteid=.*" | request_method="GET" | accept=~".*application/json.*" | __error__="" [$__range])))

panels.title: Total Requested Paste - Unique IP

targets.expr: sum(bytes_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | __error__="" [$__range]))

panels.description: This counter includes all 4xx requests for all types of requests, not just paste requests.

targets.expr:
sum(
  count_over_time(
    {job="nginx"}
    | json
    | status=~"4.."
    | remote_addr!~"^172\\.20\\..*"
    | remote_addr!~"^217\\.131\\.100\\.190$"
    | __error__=""
    [$__range]
  )
)

panels.title: Total Request 4xx

targets.expr:
{job="nginx"} | json 
| remote_addr!~"^172\\.20\\..*" 
and remote_addr != "" 
and request_uri!~"(?i)(/\\.env.*|/old\\.env|/scripts$|/scripts/.*|/error/\\.env|/wp-content/uploads/.*|/public/img/icons/.*|/public/app/plugins/.*|/config/.*|/getcfg\\.php|\\?phpinfo.*|/app_dev\\.php.*|/public/fonts/.*|/public/build/.*|/wp-includes/.*|/wp-admin/.*|/wp-content/plugins/.*|/wp-json.*|/\\?customize.*|/wp-content/themes/.*|/cgi-bin/.*|/\\?ao_speedup_cachebuster.*|/favicon.ico|/d/.*|/avatar/.*|/public/.*|/connections/.*|/wp-content/.*|/\\?p=.*|/api.*)" 
| line_format "🌍 {{.remote_addr}} 🗂 {{.request_method}} 📄 {{.request_uri}} 💻 {{.user_agent}}"

{job="nginx"}
| json
| status=~"4.."
| remote_addr!~"^172\\.20\\..*"
| remote_addr!~"^217\\.131\\.100\\.190$"
| line_format "🌍 {{.remote_addr}} 🗂 {{.request_method}} 📄 {{.request_uri}} 💻 {{.user_agent}} 🚨 Status: {{.status}}"
sum by (status) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | request_method="GET" | accept=~".*application/json.*" |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | request_method="POST" | accept=~".*application/json.*" |  __error__="" [$__interval]))

sum by (host) (sum_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | request_method=~"GET|POST" | accept=~".*application/json.*" | unwrap body_bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
topk(10, sum by (user_agent) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | accept=~".*application/json.*" | __error__="" [$__range])))

topk(10, sum by (cf_connecting_ip,cf_ipcountry) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | request_uri=~".*pasteid=.*" | request_method="GET" | accept=~".*application/json.*" | __error__="" [$__range])))

panels.title: Paste - Top 10 Requested Paste by IP and Country

targets.expr: topk(15, sum by (request_uri) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | request_uri=~".*pasteid=.*" | request_method="GET" | accept=~".*application/json.*" | __error__="" [$__range])))

topk(15, sum by (referer) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | request_uri=~".*pasteid=.*" | request_method="GET" | accept=~".*application/json.*" | __error__="" [$__range])))

topk(10, sum by (cf_ipcountry) (count_over_time({$label_name=~"$label_value", job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance"} | json | request_uri=~".*pasteid=.*" | request_method="GET" | accept=~".*application/json.*" | __error__="" [$__range])))

title: Access Log
